post.date: Posted: Thu Aug 11, 2005 12:20 am Post subject:
post.author: kat
post.body:
MODELLING & TEXTURING
Modelling & texturing - Lightwave
Getting animated models into D3 using Maya - Link Fixed 10/31/05
Prepping models for Doom 3
Smoothgroups and Doom 3
Modelling terrain
Vertex Blending
ASE render bumping with Doom 3 and Quake 4

EXPORTING to MD5
LWO to Doom 3 (static models) - MilkShape3D
exporting from Maya to MD5

IMPORTING MD5

RENDERBUMP(flat)
using 'renderbump'

MISC.
General tuts on meshsmooth body, leg, foot & hand modelling
helpful tut on weapon modelling (not uber-high poly)
'Joan of Arc' tutorial on a complete character with meshsmooth
Brain Trepaning tutorial site

post.date: Posted: Thu Aug 25, 2005 3:30 pm Post subject:
post.author: ajm113
post.body:
New: Z Brush. Plug in's download links on Maya, Lightwave, and 3ds Max. They are below every list of tuts of that program.


Read first before making a map in doom3 editor for any one on any program http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=6445
This link tells you the right size to make a map so you wont get a over larg map or to of a small of a one.

Maya

The makers of Maya website
http://www.alias.com

Software keys Link
http://www.alias.com/eng/login/enquiries/ple_unlock_m60/index.html

Learn Maya tools here for bigginers
http://www.planetunreal.com/mentallic/Tutorial/Tute1Page1.html

High quality rendering of D3 models
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=10636

Creating a Desk Lamp http://www.halbstein.com/tutorials/deskLamp/lampPages/lampPageOne.htm
In this tutorial, we will make a desk lamp using Light Intensity Curves, Light Fog, Double-Sided Shading and Shader Glow.

Create your own HDR environment map in Maya http://www.vi-motion.de/latlong_Tutorial/
Discusses how to create your own HDR environment map in Maya/mental ray for image based lighting

Maya & Mental Ray Volume Scattering (Ray Marching) http://www.jhavna.net/main.php?page=scatter
Covers how to create light fog using mental ray and Maya. This is an effect caused when light passes through smokey or dusty atmosphere.

DEFORM PIPE TUTORIAL FOR MAYA http://home.planet.nl/~kamps119/index.html
Bending a pipe using a Nonlinear Deformer. (Written for level designers)

Maya model importer link on how to make models for Doom3
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=6882

learn How to work on monster teeth video.
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=11965

Maya plug-in's

Creature making.
http://www.fxrealm.com/products/mayaplugins.htm

Mel scripting plug in
http://www.maxliani.com/technology/MelStudioPro_MainEn.html


Lightwave

Lightwave website.
http://www.newtek.com/lightwave/index.php

Lightwave Endorphin learning edition is free to download. http://www.spinquad.com/forums/showthread.php?t=7208&goto=nextoldest

BASIC LIGHTWAVE TUTORIAL NUMBER ONE. Constitution Class Saucer.
http://www.trekmania.net/art/tutorial_1.htm

Creat a wisky bottel
http://www.the123d.com/tutorial/lightwave3/jackdaniels01.shtml


How to make light in lightwave
http://www.warpedspace.org/Tutorial_Files/TutorialBIG.htm


Creating an Army of Bipeds in Lightwave
http://www.the123d.com/tutorial/lightwave2/crowd01.shtml


UV texturing in Lightwave by Max http://www.borderequals0.org/articles/uv_intro.cfm

realistic Cool effect to make earth have fun with this lightwave fans.
http://personal.southern.edu/~dascott/tutorial01/nasa-earth.htm

How to make landscaping http://www.puppydoodle.biz/tutorials/Landscape_Sky_Enviro.htm

Labeling a can of cola. http://www.newtek.com/products/lightwave/tutorials/surface/cola/index.html

Have a new map and have a team and A company to make mods or other things. Here is a good one to make a Logo Animation. http://www.newtek.com/products/lightwave/tutorials/animation/logo_animation/index.html

How to make gears move the way you whant them to.
http://www.newtek.com/products/lightwave/tutorials/animation/gear-expression/index.html

Gravity and fly-throughs
http://www.borderequals0.org/articles/gfly.cfm

Paper Cutout Modeling
http://www.borderequals0.org/articles/cutout.cfm

A cool topic I found giving this link to a site on lightwave tools
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=2741

How to make terran video.
ftp://ftp.newtek.com/pub/LightWave/Tutorials/Vidz/Terrain_Morph.mov

How to make a dinosor
http://creativedigital.bizhosting.com/Creative%20TutorialsPage.htm

Simplylightwave.com
http://www.simplylightwave.com/movie_pages/category.mhtml?cat_id=3

Book: lightwave 8 killer tips http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0735713715/103-7604981-2188606?v=glance

makers of 3ds Max link

http://206.145.80.239/zbc/showthread.php?t=28707

Begginer

Box modeling
